plot: A ragtag team of math nerds from Yale embark on their journey to win the National Collegiate Math-a-Thon against their arch-nemesis, Harvard.
plot_en: A ragtag team of math nerds from Yale embark on their journey to win the National Collegiate Math-a-Thon against their arch-nemesis, Harvard.
plot_es: A ragtag team of math nerds from Yale embark on their journey to win the National Collegiate Math-a-Thon against their arch-nemesis, Harvard.
title: Math Warriors
